title: Griswold Open Cell Sponge
content: Rogers offers a wide range of Griswold open cell, natural cellular rubber products. Used worldwide in a variety of applications from apparel, footwear, industrial matting, and other specialty promotional items.  From comfort to surface protection, Griswold Natural Rubber products are a natural choice for designers.
description: SRP is a Preferred Converter of KUSHON Sponge. SRP has been providing custom converted products to various industries since 1951.

materials.title: Sponge
materials.content: SPONGE MATERIALS CUSTOM CONVERTED TO YOUR SPECIFICATIONS – GASKETS, SEALS, PADS AND MOREUsing the highest quality Sponge materials, SRP custom fabricates products for Gasketing, Cushioning, Sealing, Shock Absorption, and Vibration Control. From applications requiring a simple gasket, to heat shielding, insulating, chemical resistance, weather resistance, you name it, we have a solution for your product. We also provide laminating and slitting technologies to make your product better performing and more efficient. SRP: Building Relationships through Converting Solutions Since 1951We provide our customers with everything from material sampling and product prototyping to full manufacturing, packaging, and delivery. We provide value to our customers by delivering exceptional customer service, engineering solutions, and quality products to meet their every need.
materials.description: SRP converts a variety of sponge materials into custom gaskets, seals and pads for a variety of industries and applications.

suppliers.title: Griswold, LLC.
suppliers.content: From vibration control to shock and impact absorption, sealing to non-skid solutions – you can count on their seasoned engineering team for deep expertise to help you create effective approaches and meet unique functional requirements.Griswold® enlighten-U® – Exceptional Long-Term Sealing and Cushioning PerformanceGriswold’s enlighten-U® microcellular urethane has excellent compression set resistance, predictable hardness, tight thickness tolerances and superior energy absorption properties, perfect for a variety of gasketing and sealing applications in the automotive/transportation, medical, polishing, flexographic printing and electronics industries. The enlighten-U products continually evolve to meet the needs of your advancing technology. At Griswold, the engineering and production teams are flexible and nimble, often working with tight timelines to meet demanding customer requirements.Key Benefits:Breadth of hardnessBroad range of thicknessesEnergy absorptionFlame retardantLow compression setPlasticizer freeGriswold® Sponge – Problem Solving Materials for Slipping, Gripping, Sealing and Vibration ManagementGriswold offers a wide range of open cell, cellular rubber products based predominantly on natural rubber, but also include offerings in neoprene, EPDM, Nitrile and SBR, as well as custom-designed compounds.Key Benefits:Anti-slipBroad range of constructionsBroad range of thicknessElectrostatically dissipativeFlexible formatsTough and durableGriswold® FlameSafe™ – The Solution for Applications Needing UL Approval for Heat ResistanceWith FlameSafe™, designers can now utilize the great properties of natural rubber, like tremendous grip and wear in friction components, with vibration and noise damping properties for applications that require UL approval, such as appliances, robotics, and enclosures.Key Benefits:UL HBF Yellow CardHigh coefficient of frictionNoise and vibration dampingLong lifeUL approved
suppliers.description: Griswold, LLC. - Your Partner for a Wide Range of Engineered Cellular Rubber
